body:
### Problem

(i dont speak english, so i will probably say something wrong, and i saw other forum posts about similar problems)

I am a very noob user of nvim (you can imagine why im here), and decided to install the kickstart.nvim config, but after using it for a while, didnt like it, so i tried to remove it, but something went wrong in this process, after deleting most of the files of the configuration, i keep receiving this error, when i try go to `:help treesitter` or open a .lua file (yes i know, didnt read the documentation to uninstall everithing, even after reading didnt work, yes im dumb as well)

(the first line of error is in portuguese, but i translated in the title of the post)
```
Erro detectado ao processar BufReadPost Autocommands for "*":
Error executing lua callback: /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: Error executing lua: /usr/share/nvim
/runtime/filetype.lua:36: BufReadPost Autocommands for "*"..FileType Autocommands for "*"..function <SNR>1_
LoadFTPlugin[20]..script /usr/share/nvim/runtime/ftplugin/help.lua: Vim(runtime):E5113: Error while calling
 lua chunk: /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/language.lua:107: no parser for 'vimdoc' language, s
ee :help treesitter-parsers
stack traceback:
        [C]: in function 'error'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/language.lua:107: in function 'add'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/languagetree.lua:111: in function 'new'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter.lua:41: in function '_create_parser'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter.lua:108: in function 'get_parser'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter.lua:416: in function 'start'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/ftplugin/help.lua:2: in main chunk
        [C]: in function 'nvim_cmd'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:36: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35>
        [C]: in function 'nvim_buf_call'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:10>
stack traceback:
        [C]: in function 'nvim_cmd'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:36: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35>
        [C]: in function 'nvim_buf_call'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:10>
stack traceback:
        [C]: in function 'nvim_buf_call'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:10>
```
I literally uninstall neovim, remove all cache files, re-installed, etc, but nothing works
(i dont care for starting from zero, i will probably use just 2 or 3 plugins in the future, so if your solution is a complete uninstall that works and solves the problem, just say it)

NOTE : TSUpdate and TSInstall didnt work (says that the command didnt exist);
And using this command `:verbose autocmd BufReadPost` show this result bellow
```
--- Autocomandos ---
filetypedetect  BufReadPost
    *         <Lua 25: /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:10>
        Definido pela última vez em Lua (run Nvim with -V1 for more details)
              if !did_filetype() && expand('<amatch>') !~ g:ft_ignore_pat | runtime! scripts.vim | endif
        Definido pela última vez em Lua (run Nvim with -V1 for more details)
gzip  BufReadPost
    *.gz      call gzip#read("gzip -dn")
        Definido pela última vez em /usr/share/nvim/runtime/plugin/gzip.vim line 25
    *.bz2     call gzip#read("bzip2 -d")
        Definido pela última vez em /usr/share/nvim/runtime/plugin/gzip.vim line 26
    *.Z       call gzip#read("uncompress")
        Definido pela última vez em /usr/share/nvim/runtime/plugin/gzip.vim line 27
    *.lzma    call gzip#read("lzma -d")
        Definido pela última vez em /usr/share/nvim/runtime/plugin/gzip.vim line 28
    *.xz      call gzip#read("xz -d")
        Definido pela última vez em /usr/share/nvim/runtime/plugin/gzip.vim line 29
    *.lz      call gzip#read("lzip -d")
        Definido pela última vez em /usr/share/nvim/runtime/plugin/gzip.vim line 30
    *.zst     call gzip#read("zstd -d --rm")
        Definido pela última vez em /usr/share/nvim/runtime/plugin/gzip.vim line 31
    *.br      call gzip#read("brotli -d --rm")
        Definido pela última vez em /usr/share/nvim/runtime/plugin/gzip.vim line 32
    *.lzo     call gzip#read("lzop -d -U")
        Definido pela última vez em /usr/share/nvim/runtime/plugin/gzip.vim line 33
editorconfig  BufReadPost
    *         <Lua 29: /usr/share/nvim/runtime/plugin/editorconfig.lua:4>
        Definido pela última vez em Lua (run Nvim with -V1 for more details)
```

### Steps to reproduce

I used pure nvim install, in Fedora 40, installed the kickstart config (comes with a bunch of plugins, using lazy.nvim), and after that, delete all the files in .config/nvim/ folder

### Expected behavior

every .lua file, or trying using help, whetever thing related to treesitter, will appear this error (you can ignore the warning, but i just dont want this)
```
Erro detectado ao processar BufReadPost Autocommands for "*":
Error executing lua callback: /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: Error executing lua: /usr/share/nvim
/runtime/filetype.lua:36: BufReadPost Autocommands for "*"..FileType Autocommands for "*"..function <SNR>1_
LoadFTPlugin[20]..script /usr/share/nvim/runtime/ftplugin/help.lua: Vim(runtime):E5113: Error while calling
 lua chunk: /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/language.lua:107: no parser for 'vimdoc' language, s
ee :help treesitter-parsers
stack traceback:
        [C]: in function 'error'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/language.lua:107: in function 'add'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter/languagetree.lua:111: in function 'new'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter.lua:41: in function '_create_parser'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter.lua:108: in function 'get_parser'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/treesitter.lua:416: in function 'start'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/ftplugin/help.lua:2: in main chunk
        [C]: in function 'nvim_cmd'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:36: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35>
        [C]: in function 'nvim_buf_call'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:10>
stack traceback:
        [C]: in function 'nvim_cmd'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:36: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35>
        [C]: in function 'nvim_buf_call'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:10>
stack traceback:
        [C]: in function 'nvim_buf_call'
        /usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: in function </usr/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:10>
```

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

0.10.0

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

yes, 0.10.0

### Operating system/version

Fedora 40

### Terminal name/version

Alacritty

### $TERM environment variable

dont know

### Installation

RPM

comment_data.body: This is a problem with the Fedora package.
@zeertzjq We might be seeing this on another distro, any hints as to what might be causing it so that the maintainers can fix it?
Install the treesitter parsers that are specified in our manifest (`deps.txt`) **in that exact version**.

title: Error detected while processing BufReadPost Autocommands for "*":
